contents: Article 3 (Definition) The meanings of terms used in these regulations are as follows. Revised 2019. 11. 7., 2022. 9. 28. 1. Human rights are the dignity, value, and freedom as a human being guaranteed by the Constitution of the Republic of Korea and laws, or recognized by international human rights treaties and international customary law to which the Republic of Korea has joined and ratified. speaks of rights 2. Human rights management refers to preventing human rights violations by an organization and carrying out human rights-friendly management activities. The organization declares a human rights policy, fulfills human rights due diligence, and provides support to victims of human rights violations. This means providing relief procedures for 3. Competitors refer to players, coaches, referees, and player management personnel registered in the ‘Competitor Registration System’ in accordance with Article 2, Paragraph 1 of the Sports Association’s Competitor Registration Regulations. 4. Related organizations refer to member organizations of the Sports Association and their member organizations. 5. Stakeholder refers to a person related to the management activities of the Sports Council and a corporation or individual who has a relationship with the Sports Council, such as partner companies and local residents.
